name: Spideyy Game
description:
Spideyygame is a action platformer with metroidvania elements.We roam through the forest and caves in order to reunite with our family back.

Story: Our main character is a spider named Ceres. When he was just an embrio he got separated from his family in a windy day.Then he lives on his own till he becomes strong enough to get on a journey and find his family.But his family may not be as friendly as he remembers.

Ozan Can Önen: Animations,Code,Level Design
Muhammed Uğur Ardin: Code
Emre Çetinkaya: Level Design
Bora Cengiz: Sound Design,Music
Osman Batuhan Korçak: Art
